description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This is a game you the objective is to live for as long as you can through an endless amount of enemies. As you make your way through all of the enemy ships you realize that their numbers keep growing and that they keep getting tougher. Sooner of later you realize that your time is limited and that your goal now is to take as many ships with you before you reach "Nebula's End".
